hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #symphony in the Spirit Temple# yields #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Symphony Room Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Hidden Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Fairy Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Falling Spikes Room

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #Goron City#.
